long_description: Egg Beater 3 mountain bike pedals from Crank Brothers are simple, smart and effective. Egg Beaters are redesigned for 2011 to be stronger and better looking than ever. With 4 sides to choose from, pedal entry is easy and reliable; you'll click in quicker than on any other pedal. Unique design and few moving parts allow reliable entry and release even when gunked up with mud. New spindle is manufactured to pass European standards of quality and safety; you won't need to worry about breaking the spindle. New spring design alleviates wing rattle, spring migration and breakage from fatigue. Watertight and airtight internal parts promote a long life and require little maintenance. Egg Beater 3 pedals feature a cast stainless-steel body and strong cast steel wings. 6deg of soft float. Pedals should only be used with the included Egg Beater cleats, which fit almost any SPD-compatible shoe.
short_description: Egg Beater 3 mountain bike pedals from Crank Brothers are simple, smart and effective. Egg Beaters are redesigned for 2011 to be stronger and better looking than ever.
